name: Bloxitivity
description: Bloxitivity is a puzzle/platformer with a powerful twist - you get to create the puzzles and then share them with friends and fans using the Steam Workshop or the XML files used by the game! What will you create?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.4ghz or equivalent Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM, Open GL Support DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500MB MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Pentium 4 3.0ghz or equivalent Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1GB VRAM, Open GL Support DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11.0 Compatible
